channel.title: Making Server with someone! Ill be hoster!

item.title: Making Server with someone! Ill be hoster!
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

[quote=“Server-Unknown.Net, post:9, topic:252840”][quote author=X Screech X link=topic=333987.msg2601561#msg2601561 date=1230262098]
Chassy is right. This should just be locked. No posting things like this here. Just go brush up on the rules. Also, if you want a host, get either a VPS or learn a thing or two.
[/quote]

I’ll be web developer, current one Im working on is for ThugScape (click here for site im working on atm), and i already have things set up, I just need a different no-ip (which doesn’t require much to do…). And what is VPS?

I didn’t say anything about the hosting. And if your gonna act like a dick, no one needs to help you.

Well you seem to be someone jumping into a issue so I flamed you back, not going to let anyone get in my way. Sorry.[/quote]

This isnt server help, why is it in a server help section? Thats the point.

Read full topic
item.source: Making Server with someone! Ill be hoster!

I’ll be web developer, current one Im working on is for ThugScape (click here for site im working on atm), and i already have things set up, I just need a different no-ip (which doesn’t require much to do…). And what is VPS?

chassy13:

I didn’t say anything about the hosting. And if your gonna act like a dick, no one needs to help you.

Well you seem to be someone jumping into a issue so I flamed you back, not going to let anyone get in my way. Sorry.
